content:
assistant> Hello! I’m your AI guide for building a doodle caption. I’m designed to ask you questions and guide your reasoning but if you want to take control of your own creative process, I’ll be happy to help wherever possible.
user> Howdy!!

The conversational style here establishes an engaging and collaborative atmosphere, encouraging the human participant to take the lead in the creative process. This approach is effective in fostering creativity and ownership of ideas, making it easier for the user to feel confident in crafting their droodle caption.
